Title: Challenging the Watcher
Text:
Manwyn reacted strangely to the presence and touch of the stone-heart, recoiling from it in terror. He told you that the heart had been prepared to receive a fell spirit from an elder Age, similar to those that inhabit the wights which serve Angmar.

Manwyn believes the charm he placed on you will allow you passage through the Watchers, but warns that it may draw an Ancient spirit out you must defeat.
CompleteText: You vanquished the spirit? How your victory heartens me, @p. It gives me hope that we may yet succeed!
